SpaceX's 30th robotic Dragon cargo ship is headed back home to Earth.

articles.title: Measles cases worldwide almost double in a year - as England faces measles 'emergency' - Sky News
articles.content:
Measles cases nearly doubled globally between 2022 and 2023, researchers say. 
There were 321,582 cases worldwide in 2023 - an 88% increase from the previous year, when 171,153 cases were recorded.… [+2302 chars]
